casebody.data:
BARHAM
v.
HAWK, et al. No. 461PA04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 5, 2005. Scott M. Stevenson, Kathleen K. Lucchesi, S. Frederick Winiker, III, Patricia Wilson Magee, Charlotte, for Hawk & Ear, Nose & Throat. E. Hardy Lewis, for Gloria Barham.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th day of July 2005 by Plaintiff for extension of time to file brief until 8/1/05:

"Motion Allowed. Plaintiff (Barham) shall have up to and including the 1st day of August 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of July 2005."
